meanings.definition: A person with fair hair and typically fair skin.
meanings.sent1: The blonde girl had a sunny smile.
meanings.sent2: My sister is a blonde with blue eyes.
meanings.sent3: The blonde at the party was the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her blonde hair shone like a field of wheat in the sun.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the blonde lifeguard at the beach.

meanings.sent1: The painting had a touch of blonde in the background.
meanings.sent2: The sunrise painted the sky with shades of blonde.
meanings.sent3: The cake frosting was a delicious shade of blonde.
meanings.sent4: The blonde of the sand reminded me of golden honey.
meanings.sent5: The blonde of the leaves in autumn was breathtaking.
